pullrequest.title: Move light_buoy controller to gazebo plugin

content.raw:
Added a couple more fixes into this pr:

* fix typo in polyform\_a7 model
* Allow sandisland.launch to be used with worlds outside of robotx\_gazebo package \(like in \[this new tutorial\]\([#!/osrf/vmrc/wiki/tutorials/Adding course elements](#!/osrf/vmrc/wiki/tutorials/Adding%20course%20elements)\)\)

‌
